text:
<setup: Raskolnikov and Porfiry in a tense meeting>  
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>  
Raskolnikov: *Why is this so serious?*  

Porfiry: *You must inform the police.*  

Raskolnikov: *But I have no funds right now!*  

---  

<setup: Razumihin observing, anxious tension>  
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>  
Razumihin: *This is getting uncomfortable.*  

Porfiry: *Just declare the items are yours.*  

Raskolnikov: *I only wanted to claim them!*

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov discusses a matter of business with Porfiry Petrovitch, revealing his financial struggles while trying to claim ownership of certain items related to a murder.
